title: nambi varum
sahitya:
nambi varum anbarellAm tunbamurAduyyavar semmAlin marugan sEvarkkoDiyOnai


anupallavi

  ambalavANar magizha akhilamellAm pugazha umbar uyyumAru uditta upakAranai


caraNam    nAstika vAdam pEsha nA kUshiDAdavar Attigattai Eshi pEshi AvEshap-pUsalUTTum
kUttil ADum kOmALi pAttirar AghAmal tOttarippOr dAsan tOghai mayil vAhanan
